title: Topic 001 Question 259
body: A SysOps administrator is tasked with analyzing database performance. The database runs on a single Amazon RDS DB instance. The SysOps administrator finds that, during times of peak traffic, resources on the database are overutilized due to the amount of read traffic.
Which actions should the SysOps administrator take to improve RDS performance? (Choose two.)
options: Modify the application to use Amazon ElastiCache for Memcached.
Migrate the database from RDS to Amazon DynamoDB.
Migrate the database to Amazon EC2 with enhanced networking enabled.
Upgrade the database to a Multi-AZ deployment.
